translation: Tvhụ̄ lukh chihnv zyadh khoth zyadh akh akụ̄ sndụ̄ khoth brvnhh nyirith dunya ḥạṣl krnh chih fikri ghflts mnz trạvimtụ̄.
Yvt tam zan (athụ̄ fikri mnz) tvhụ̄ qbri bttihs pytth vatan chihv.

Hrgz nh, ʿnqryb lgyv pe (ʿnqryb nishhi hykhi ạkhrt thi murad ạsith th mvt thi, tikyazi yih kth chhe ansans mrnh vqte nanan zi yimn āvryaran mnz suh pnnụ̄ zndgy guzạrith āmut chuh, tim ạsya amụ̄ sndi bapt sʿādt th khvsh bkhty hund dhryʿh kinh bdanjạmy th bdbkhty hund dhryʿh).
Tohyih lghi pe, byyhi (bvuziv zi) hrgz nh, ʿnqryb lghi tohyih pae.
Hrgz nh agr tvhụ̄ yqyny ʿlmh kh ḥythyth (amhi rvishhi hund anjam) zanan chihv (tylhi āshi he nh tuhund yih ṭrzi ʿml).
Byyhi bvuziv tvhụ̄ vuchhvn bialkl yqyn san suh.
Pth yiyhi tohyih tamhi doh ẓrvur yimn nʿmtn mtʿlq jvab ṭlby krnh.
